parse.title: The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings (Canada)

links.*: The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
[[Image:The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings (Canada).jpg|thumb]]

This version of '''The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings''' was published by [[Methuen]] specifically for Canda and is identical to [[The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings]].

* ISBN 045-893700-2
* Dimensions: 13 x 12.25 inches
* Stapled; punched hanging hole
* Heavy-weight cardboard mailer
* The mailer was not sealed as the US issues of Ballantine; it has a "slot and tab"-type closure.
